translation.herop: I design and code beautifully simple things, and I love what I do.
translation.experience.title: Experience
translation.experience.senior.description: Developed and maintained web applications using React, Node.js, and Express. Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services. Led a team of developers and collaborated with UX/UI designers to create seamless user experiences.
translation.experience.fullstack.description: Built and optimized web applications with a focus on performance and scalability. Worked with technologies such as Angular, Python, and Django. Designed and developed databases and ensured data security and integrity.
translation.experience.junior.description: Assisted in developing full-stack applications and features. Gained experience with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and backend technologies like PHP and MySQL. Contributed to code reviews and documentation.
translation.experience.education: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
translation.experience.education.description: Specialized in software development, algorithms, and database management.
translation.about.me: Hello! I'm Jasper Everett, a passionate Full Stack Developer with a knack for creating dynamic and responsive web applications. My journey in the world of coding began several years ago, and since then, I've honed my skills across a wide range of technologies, enabling me to bring innovative ideas to life on both the front-end and back-end. When I'm not immersed in code, you can find me exploring the great outdoors, playing guitar, or indulging in my love for cooking. I believe that a balanced life fuels creativity and productivity. Let's connect and create something amazing together!
translation.contact.p: Interested in working together? We should queue up a time to chat. Iâ€™ll buy the coffee.
